instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00840 liquid dmaage 20v not turning on
threads.message:
So half this board has liquid over it, i have clean it, but still not turning on
i have 20v at dcin
Ppbus_g3h 13v solid
Pp3v3_g3h 3.3v
No pp5v_s5
No pp3v3_s5
Smc_pm_g2_en is 3.4v
Is this u7800 problem?

threads.title: 820-00840 liquid dmaage 20v not turning on
threads.message:
U7800 generates this voltage.

First check diode mode to ground.
Be sure to get 13V at C7844 (PPBUS_PMIC).

threads.title: 820-00840 liquid dmaage 20v not turning on
threads.message:
Can i use u7800 from 820-00239? Or must be exact board?
I got 13v in c7844

threads.title: 820-00840 liquid dmaage 20v not turning on
threads.message:
"First check diode mode to ground."
???

PMIC has firmware, but could be platform compatible; not sure however...

threads.title: 820-00840 liquid dmaage 20v not turning on
threads.message:
im sorry, but diode mode what to ground ? 
i have tried replacing u7800 from 820-00239, still the same..

threads.title: 820-00840 liquid dmaage 20v not turning on
threads.message: okay, know I don't have ppbus_pmic, i tried putting back the old one, still no ppbus_pmic

threads.title: 820-00840 liquid dmaage 20v not turning on
threads.message:
PPBUS_PMIC comes from PPBUS_G3H, via R7835.
What happened there???

threads.title: 820-00840 liquid dmaage 20v not turning on
threads.message: so.. the ppbus_g3h itself doesnt come now, r7835 doesnt have continuity on it, so I replaced it already

threads.title: 820-00840 liquid dmaage 20v not turning on
threads.message:
You did something wrong when swapped PMIC.
Any short?
R7835 cannot blow by itself...
